item.description:
Greetings, Meditators! You will be interested in this DVD being show this Tuesay, Nov. 9 at A Higher Balance. It shows a satsang (spiritual teaching) with Adyashanti, a young awakened teacher who says “You are pure consciousness, already free, awake and liberated. Stand up and walk out of your dream. I am here to say that you can do this.”- I've been on a retreat with him, and listen repeatedly to his CD's. Come join us for the movie and snacks, followed by our own meditation and sharing. Fee is $9, snacks included. RSVP appreciated!
The DVD is shown on a high end projection system and giant screen. Bring friends if you want!
item.how_to_find_us: Enter at the center of the building, go up one flight. Suite 6B is above Starbucks.

group.name: The Salem MA Meditation Meetup Group

item.name: Adyashanti DVD about awakening consciousness
